artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Yamamotoya Heikichi
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: standing frowning man, looking slightly downward, holding a strand of white and coral-colored beads with large green tassels in his PL hand; man wear a medium blue kimono and a sleeveless light blue long jacket
marks: (Died on Dec. 7 at the age of 57) | Farewell poem 應需國貞画 {ōju Kunisada ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Memorial Portrait of the Actor Bandō Mitsugorō V
